text: Iye akati: “Imi vanhu vangu! Ndiudzei kana ndiine humboo huri pachena kubva kuna Tenzi vangu, uye vakandipa raramo yakanaka kubva kwavari (ndoikanganisa here nekuisanganisa nemari yeuhori)? Uye handishuvire kupesana nemi ndichiita izvo zvandinokurambidzai. Asi ndinoshuvira chete shanduko yakanaka yandinokwanisa. Uye gwara rangu haribve kuna ani asi kuna Allah, kwavari ndinovimba uye kwavari ndinokumbira ruregerero.”
